title.narrative: Local Integration Of Vulnerable And Excluded Uprooted Afghans (Live-Up)

description.narrative: The purpose of this programme is to improve the living conditions and tenure security in urban neighbourhoods and peripheral IDP settlements with the re-integration of Afghan returnees and IDPs into society. It aims to directly impact 11,250 households / 112,125 people living in inner-city under-served settlements and 4,000 households living in peri-urban IDP settlements.

department.narrative: Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya
